description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) and condition 9 (Arboricultural Report) of planning permission P/2013/2848 dated 23/08/2013 (as varied by P/2013/4791 dated 23/12/2013 and P/2015/0372 dated 29/04/2015) for retention of existing residential floorspace (Class C3) and change of use of the building from hostel (Sui Genuris) to create seven (7) residential (class c3) units comprising of 4 x 2 bedroom flats, 3 x 6 bedroom houses, the erection of a two-storey rear extension and alterations to the front elevation, including the reinstatement of front staircase and entrance, the rationalisation of the existing bin stores, installation of new boundary fencing / railing / gates: the reinstatement of a chimney stack; installation of rooflight window and the replacement of an existing window with a new doorway on the front (northwest) elevation. variation to provide for the installation of timber framed french doors to replace first floor window on the rear elevation; installation of automatic opening vent on the front roof slope; installation of double glazed windows; enlargement of excavated area to accommodate rear lower ground floor terrace and associated alteration of tree protection measures.
